Enter the date and time when the malfunction was discovered to see live repair deadlines for all MEL categories

days

Enter the repair interval specified in MEL Remarks/Exceptions Column 5 for Category A items

Current time: 2025-08-10 22:50 UTC

MEL Categories

Category A
Items required for safe operation
Standard Time: Per MEL Remarks/Exceptions (Column 5) (Variable)
Time interval excludes day of discovery for calendar/flight days
Category B
Items with operational and/or maintenance relief
Standard Time: 3 consecutive calendar days (72 hours)
Excludes day of discovery - begins at midnight UTC on discovery day
Category C
Items with operational relief
Standard Time: 10 consecutive calendar days (240 hours)
Excludes day of discovery - begins at midnight UTC on discovery day
Category D
Items with extended operational relief
Standard Time: 120 consecutive calendar days (2880 hours)
Excludes day of discovery - begins at midnight UTC on discovery day
MEL Repair Interval Rules:
  • • Day of discovery is excluded from calendar day calculations
  • • Time intervals begin at midnight UTC on discovery day
  • • Category A follows specific MEL Remarks/Exceptions
  • • All times calculated in UTC per aviation regulations
